title: swissTLMRegio
description: swissTLMRegio is a 2D landscape model, which represents the natural and man-made features of the landscape in vector format. With its high generalisation grade it is a reference dataset for applications requiring a regional or national overview. swissTLMRegio describes about 950 000 objects with their location, shape and neighbourhood connections (topology) as well as the object type and further attributes. swissTLMRegiois composed of 6 thematic topics. Each topic contains one or more feature classes: Transportation, Hydrography, Landcover, Buildings, Miscellaneous, Names..

links.title: Licence for the free geodata of the Federal Office of Topography swisstopo
